EmailTemplate.name: Lanc Associate Mentor 2013 invite to Training (final)
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Associate Mentor application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for applying for the role of {!Job_Application__c.Role_to_assess_for__c} with The Challenge Network. We are delighted to tell you that your application has been successful. Welcome on board!
The {!Job_Application__c.Role_to_assess_for__c} is an important role and one that we greatly value as part of the summer programme. All {!Job_Application__c.Role_to_assess_for__c}s must attend a training session where you will have the chance to meet other Mentors and learn essential skills for your role.
Please view and choose a date by clicking on the link below: http://thechallenge.secure.force.com/AvailableDates?key={!Job_Application__c.ContactId__c}&Type=2&JType={!Job_Application__c.Id}
We look forward to seeing you at training.
Many thanks and best wishes,
The Challenge Society
